title: Ticket #5913: Consider ClaimId in collector forward filter
description:
When a collector is filtering ads that it forwards to a parent collector, it should always forward a startd ad when the ClaimId changes. Otherwise, a negotiator pulling ads from the parent collector will give out stale claims that can't be used by the schedds.

The ClaimId is in the private startd ad, which is not currently checked by the forwarding code. PublicClaimId, in the public startd ad, could be checked, but it's only published for Claimed slots.
